title: R v. Smith
summary: The defendant was charged with burglary after CCTV footage showed entry to a residential property. The defense argued the footage was tampered with.

title: Johnson v. Acme Corp.
summary: Plaintiff alleged workplace discrimination based on age. The company claimed performance issues were the real cause for termination.

title: Patel v. Patel
summary: Dispute over child custody following divorce. The court focused on best interests of the child and parental fitness.

title: R v. Lee
summary: Defendant was accused of impaired driving causing injury. Breathalyzer evidence was contested.

title: Green v. City Council
summary: Plaintiff sued for negligence after slipping on poorly maintained public property.

title: Brown v. Retail Ltd.
summary: Claim of unfair dismissal related to whistleblower protections. Employer denied allegations.

title: TechCo v. Innovatech
summary: Patent infringement dispute over software algorithms. Both parties claimed original development.

title: State v. Kumar
summary: Accused charged with cybercrime related to data theft. Defense challenged evidence collection process.

title: Anderson v. Medical Center
summary: Plaintiff alleged negligence resulting in delayed diagnosis and harm.

title: Evans v. Evans
summary: Dispute over division of assets following separation. Court considered prenuptial agreement validity.
